text: James H. Gordon (1868 â€“ 1936) was a justice for the Oklahoma Supreme Court during 1924. == Early life and education == Gordon was born on October 3, 1868 in Virginia. He got educated at Suffolk Military Academy and later got the degree of Bachelor of Law while attending the University of Virginia in 1890. == Career == On 1890, Gordon relocated to Oklahoma and made the law firm Stuart, Lewis and Gordon. On 1924, He got appointed a Justice of the Oklahoma Supreme Court. He died in Oklahoma on October 23, 1936. Category:Lawyers from Oklahoma Category:1936 deaths Category:1868 births
title: James H. Gordon
